title: Alice Parker and the Mind Magician
description: Alice Parker has adapted well to her extraordinary new identity and abilities; she’s even beginning to enjoy them. But mysterious things are happening all around her. People are behaving very strangely. Something or someone is controlling them – but how? Alice confronts a ruthless, relentless villain, and soon discovers his astonishing power. Where is it coming from? What makes him so different? Disturbingly, the answers to these questions reveal more about Alice than her sinister enemy. Nothing, it seems, is coincidence...
author: Nicola Palmer
